briefTitle: 18F-fluoroestradiol (18F-FES) PET/CT Guided First-line Treatment for HR+/HER2- Metastatic Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: A Single-center, Real-world Study Exploring the Guidance of FES-PET for First-line Treatment of HR Positive, HER2 Negative Unresectable or Metastatic Breast Cancer Patients
